Author: elitecstrike
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: The latest updates on the HOQU platform https://blog.hoqu.io/the-latest-updates-on-the-hoqu-platform-5d17825607ea  1)The business version of the HOQU system will soon include the postbacks subsection for all roles. You can find it in the “Integration” section.  2) Automatic updates of messages in the Tickets subsection have also been launched (Support section →Tickets). Now users do not need to manually refresh the web page to get up-to-date data.  3) Email notifications and system notifications have been connected. Now with the help of the filter tools added to the system, each user can independently configure the format and content of the notifications they want to receive. The notifications will be sent in the language selected by the user in the system.  4) The Time zone field is now available in the settings (Account → Settings). Users can select the preferable time zone according to which the data in the statistics will be displayed  5) The Tickets section has been improved  6) The networks now see the Disconnected status for disconnected participants in the Wallets section. In this case, the network cannot perform any actions with the wallet.  7) Information about each participant is now available in most sections. Users can view the information about the participant by clicking on the participant’s name, after which the system will display the information about that participant.

Author: brother3
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Postbacks. A short guide  Affiliate marketing has several popular integration methods. One of them is Postbacks. Postbacks are one of the useful features that can make working more convenient, and today, we will tell you how.  The Postback is a mechanism for transferring data from an affiliate program to a third-party tracking solution. Postbacks allow affiliates to instantly receive information about the user’s actions, while merchants and networks can easily integrate with each other through it.  https://blog.hoqu.io/postbacks-a-short-guide-a1ec3d86453c

Body: ⚠️ Important announcement ⚠️  🔥 October  12, 2018 from 19:00 to 20:00 UTC (from 7 pm to 8pm), HOQU founder answers questions live.  🔥  🚀Dear members of the HQQU community!🚀  We are thankful for your support.  Your opinion and your feedback is very valuable for us. We are sure that there are a lot of interesting questions that you would like to pose personally to the founders of the project.  💥 And we are delighted to give you this opportunity by answering your questions in English live!💥  ✅ Please write your questions in advance to be sure that your question will be answered. You can send your question via private messages to any of the admins of the official chat room, or to the official HOQU chat with the tag "question to founder" ✅ Questions should not contain obscene speech and insults. ✅ Questions should concern the HOQU project. ✅ Questions that were posed in advance will be answered first.  The conversation will be held in English in the official HOQU chat room in Telegram  https://t.me/hoqu_official  Answers to the most frequently asked questions will be posted on social networks.  🚀We will be waiting for you! 🚀 In the near future, you will also have the opportunity to pose your questions directly to the developers.  Stay tuned and follow our news updates.

Author: Artemsv
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU Founders Extend Their Token Freeze Period https://blog.hoqu.io/hoqu-founders-extend-their-token-freeze-period-5f997f553e9c  The HOQU project founders have decided to freeze their tokens and extend the freeze period. As per the earlier plan, the founders had the right to unfreeze their tokens in July. However, given the current development of the project and the market situation, the founders have decided to prolong the period under December 31, 2019.  The given decision has been made to demonstrate to the token holders that the founders have a real and genuine, vested interest in developing the product and the project. The founders believe that their example will serve as a powerful incentive for all to hold their tokens and wait for the project’s launch.  We sincerely thank the entire Community for its support and would like to ensure its members that the project team is working hard to make sure that HOQU becomes the future of advertising as it was initially promised.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: ❗️Updated HOQU Roadmap ❗️  HOQU has updated the project development roadmap, as after six months of work, the project developers and programmers have a deeper understanding of what has already been implemented, where the project is currently and what awaits it in the future.🔥 The new roadmap has become a two-tier path as most of the work takes place in parallel.🔥 Moreover, each stage is divided into two others.☝️  1️⃣ Alpha - when the product can already be used by participants with a minimal set of functionality. At this stage, most services are not yet ready for public use; 2️⃣ Beta - when the product acquires the outlines of a ready-made solution, but may contain errors and defects. At this stage, services can be accessed by focus groups for testing, or public functionality will be limited to the tested content; 3️⃣ Release version - the product is ready for release and operation. The product will be publicly available, but it is possible to correct errors found during its use.  At the moment, several teams are busy with the parallel development of the webmaster and advertiser interfaces, the tracking services, and the widgets for generating leads. Also, the development of the platform's smart contact and API for access to the blockchain network continues unabated.  ⚠️We are continuing to implement the advertiser’s personal account and in the near future, the team engaged in its development plans to start close integration of the advertiser and webmaster applications.⚠️  🔥All functionality development takes place in close interaction with each other stage as HOQU is developing not just a set of applications and components, but an integrated platform capable of fulfilling the most serious tasks facing all of the industry’s participants.🔥  In parallel with the development of applications and interfaces for webmasters and advertisers, our team of DevOps engineers is preparing an infrastructure base on the cloud structure of which all components of the platform will operate in the future. As a toolkit, we have chosen the Docker containerization and cluster building based on Kubernetes. Our engineers are sure that this system, which has proven itself as a reliable and a flexible solution, will serve as a good basis for the HOQU ecosystem.  🔅We hope that the updated roadmap will help our community and stakeholders better navigate the development stages of our platform and will prepare them for the important stages of its release.🔅  Stay tuned for more news and updates from HOQU as the project continues to develop.💪

Author: filsid
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU at the World Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Summit  On the 27th of January, the HOQU delegation visited the World Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Summit held in Moscow and organized by German Klimenko, advisor to the President of the Russian Federation on internet development.    The WBCSummit gathers the most engaged members of the global blockchain community, the representatives of crypto associations, authorities, foundations, investment companies, banks and IDACB’s partners. The summit will create a platform for the exchange of knowledge, experience and success in the field of the blockchain technology and regulation. The sessions will be devoted to the regulatory framework of cryptosphere and its interaction with the state bodies. More than 400 world-class professionals and 30 international organizations responsible for the blockchain regulation in Europe, the North America, the Near East, Africa and Asia are attending. The business program is set in five sections — ICO, Blockchain, Cryptocurrencies, Cryptotrading and Regulation.  https://blog.hoqu.io/hoqu-at-the-world-blockchain-and-cryptocurrency-summit-49543a5a0876

Author: theone189
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU is an ecosystem. Not a CPA network The issues we want to solve using blockchain: 1)  Cheaper. With registration on the HOQU affiliate network, each affiliate and advertiser gains free access. HOQU does not charge for platform use. 2)  HOQU, through its tracking mechanism and smart contracts, ensures that all the conditions of a customer’s offer are transparent. This ensures transparency and honesty in relationships between advertisers, affiliates, and affiliate networks. 3)  On the HOQU platform, if an affiliate network acts against an affiliate’s interests, protection can be sought by filing a request to the appeal centers. 4)  In centralized affiliate networks, payments on traditional platforms and networks take between a few days to 2-3 months to process. HOQU smart contract payments take up to 10 minutes. 5)  Thanks to blockchain solutions, members of the HOQU platform are not connected to each other in this way and are not affected by hacking 6)  Functionality. Existing platforms provide only services to users. HOQU works with all possible types of customer action and, in addition to services, offers several other types of collaboration: Ready open-source software. An API for integration. An SDK for the development of customers’ own affiliate networks or other services.

Author: Casper L
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Hi everyone!  Please, very carefully read what I write! This concerns the developers of HOQU in the first place! In view of the introduction of KYC and the collection of personal data, a certain number of very serious questions appear to the organizers and developers of HOQU. The first thing you need to pay attention to is how the KYC form is organized. To fill in such forms, I should immediately see everything in the form included items, and not open in order only after the completion of the previous paragraph. The next question is about KYC demands. As I understand it, HOQU is registered in the UK, and in the UK there is no KYC legislation in relation to bounty hunters (only in relation to investors and only starting with a certain amount of investment). The argument "we collect personal data just in case" is not at all an argument from a legal position". The next question: Who will have access to my personal data and personal information of the other participants in your campaign (personal data of bounty hunters and investors). On this account, there are already specific legal arguments.  Namely:  Convention for the Protection of Individuals with regard to Automatic Processing of Personal Data Strasbourg, 28.I.1981  Article 8 – Additional safeguards for the data subject Any person shall be enabled: a) to establish the existence of an automated personal data file, its main purposes, as well as the identity and habitual residence or principal place of business of the controller of the file; b) to obtain at reasonable intervals and without excessive delay or expense confirmation of whether personal data relating to him are stored in the automated data file as well as communication to him of such data in an intelligible form; c) to obtain, as the case may be, rectification or erasure of such data if these have been processed contrary to the provisions of domestic law giving effect to the basic principles set out in Articles 5 and 6 of this Convention; d) to have a remedy if a request for confirmation or, as the case may be, communication, rectification or erasure as referred to in paragraphs b and c of this article is not complied with.  Therefore, I ask the HOQU team to make a public and reasoned statement. I will not conduct any personal correspondence by e-mail. Please, show publicity and professionalism in this matter  To familiarize with the convention:  https://www.coe.int/en/web/conventions/full-list/-/conventions/treaty/108   List of States adopting the convention:  https://www.coe.int/en/web/conventions/full-list/-/conventions/treaty/108/declarations?p_auth=4NvQyP7U

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: 🚀 HOQU has attended the North American Bitcoin Conference  HOQU, the pioneering affiliate marketing platform, has attended the North American Bitcoin Conference with Co-Founder Alexei Shmonov and CVO Roman Kaufman presenting the project before an immense audience  🌐 The North American Bitcoin Conference, a part of World Blockchain Forum: Investments & ICOs, took place in Miami on January 18th and 19th 2018. The success of the 2017 conferences had brought together all the major players of the industry, launched some hugely successful businesses, and proven that the world of ICOs is growing exponentially. The event was attended by some of the leading names in the business and a plethora of opinion leaders, forming a star-studded panel of speakers 👍  🔝The largest conference on cryptocurrencies was attended by more than 4,000 people and assembled some of the most prominent names in the industry and the most eminent opinion leaders, all of whom had an opportunity to witness the presentation of the HOQU project and its market offering. For two days, the HOQU delegation conversed with the leading names in the business, including potential partners and those who believed in the project from the start. The project delegation gave an outstanding presentation and enthralled the audience with the success the affiliate marketing platform has already achieved.  ⚡️As HOQU continues its global roadshow in 2018, many more events and platforms for presentations await in the coming months. Stay tuned to more news and updates from HOQU – the future of marketing! ⚡️  Read more on Medium: https://blog.hoqu.io/hoqu-has-attended-the-north-american-bitcoin-conference-7e3f3b54369c

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU at the Crypto Finance Conference 18 in St. Moritz 🚀 HOQU has attended the prominent Crypto Finance Conference 18 in St. Moritz, presenting the affiliate marketing platform to an audience of world-class investors, opinion leaders and government authorities’ representatives.  The audience consisted largely of affluent family offices, investors and funds and took place in the fashionable St. Moritz hotel and resort, offering ample networking opportunities. HOQU representatives were at the event establishing firm relationships, offering investors and other representatives of the industry to purchase HQX Tokens on the secondary market, considering the end of the HOQU Token Sale.  👍The conference was organized on the highest level of convenience, offering guests bar and entertainment activities at the pre-party on the first day. The second and third days also offered guests ample entertainment and networking opportunities, including nightclub and mountainside restaurant leisure activities, creating closer ties among the attendees. HOQU Co-Founder Maxim Anikeev and Global Expansion Officer Artem Chestnov also attended the events, establishing partnership connections with investors  🤵🏼One of the key guests at the event was the Federal Counselor of Switzerland. Among other notable attendees were Swiss projects that HOQU was able to counsel on a number of issues.  🔥 HOQU continues its global roadshow, attending various conferences and presenting the pioneering marketing platform, forming a solid base for its future development. Stay tuned to more news and updates from HOQU in the coming weeks 🔥  Read more on Medium: https://blog.hoqu.io/hoqu-at-the-crypto-finance-conference-18-in-st-moritz-fdc902ca9e96

Author: TOM47
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU at the Crypto Finance Conference 18 in St. Moritz  HOQU has attended the prominent Crypto Finance Conference 18 in St. Moritz, presenting the affiliate marketing platform to an audience of world-class investors, opinion leaders and government authorities’ representatives.  The Crypto Finance Conference ’18 in St. Moritz, Switzerland is the World’s first and largest investor conference on cryptocurrencies and blockchain investments. The CFC’18 brings together both private and institutional investors and the leading providers of the crypto & blockchain universe. The 3-day conference offered expert education, investment opportunities, excellent networking opportunities and last but not least a great setting in one of the World’s best ski resorts in the Swiss Alps.  The audience consisted largely of affluent family offices, investors and funds and took place in the fashionable St. Moritz hotel and resort, offering ample networking opportunities. HOQU representatives were at the event establishing firm relationships, offering investors and other representatives of the industry to purchase HQX Tokens on the secondary market, considering the end of the HOQU Token Sale.  The conference was organized on the highest level of convenience, offering guests bar and entertainment activities at the pre-party on the first day. The second and third days also offered guests ample entertainment and networking opportunities, including nightclub and mountainside restaurant leisure activities, creating closer ties among the attendees. HOQU Co-Founder Maxim Anikeev and Global Expansion Officer Artem Chestnov also attended the events, establishing partnership connections with investors.  One of the key guests at the event was the Federal Counselor of Switzerland. Among other notable attendees were Swiss projects that HOQU was able to counsel on a number of issues.  HOQU continues its global roadshow, attending various conferences and presenting the pioneering marketing platform, forming a solid base for its future development. Stay tuned to more news and updates from HOQU in the coming weeks.  https://blog.hoqu.io/hoqu-at-the-crypto-finance-conference-18-in-st-moritz-fdc902ca9e96

Body: ⚡️ HOQU Answered Critical Questions at WCEF ⚡️  HOQU, the pioneering affiliate marketing platform, has attended the World Crypto Economic Forum held on January 15–16, 2018 at the South SanFrancisco Conference Center.  As key expert speakers at the event, the representatives of HOQU provided vital insight to the participants of the Forum on the successful formula of creating a flourishing company with repute and a recognizable name in the business. Body: HOQU will provide all parties with the freedom to choose. If advertisers and partners want to work directly, they can do it without problems. But if, for example, advertisers don’t want to look for partners independently, they can simply switch to the partner network and their problem will be solved. The same situation relates to the partners: they won’t have to search for advertisers on their own, they can just start working with the partner network and there will be an accessible list of offers.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: HOQU Coming to Crypto Finance Conference 2018 ✈️  The project heralded as the future of marketing is headed to the Crypto Finance Conference 2018 on the 17th and 18th of January to present the promising platform’s potential to a broad, global audience of industry leaders.  The Crypto Finance Conference ’18 in St. Moritz, Switzerland is the World’s first and largest investor conference on cryptocurrencies and blockchain investments. The CFC’18 brings together both private and institutional investors and the leading providers of the crypto & blockchain universe. The 3-day conference offers expert education, investment opportunities, excellent networking opportunities and last but not least a great setting in one of the World’s best ski resorts in the Swiss Alps 🗻  HOQU shall be presented at the project by Co-Founder Maxim Anikeev, who shall be heading the project’s stand at the event. In addition, HOQU’s global expansion officer, Artem Chestnov, is one of the keynote speakers at the event.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: 🌐 HOQU Headed to World Blockchain Forum  The pioneering HOQU project is going to be presented at the World Blockchain Forum from the 18th to the 19th of January.  The most important blockchain conference of the year, The North American Bitcoin Conference, a part of World Blockchain Forum: Investments & ICOs, is taking place in Miami on January 18th and 19th 2018. The success of the 2017 conferences had brought together all the major players of the industry, launched some hugely successful businesses, and proven that the world of ICOs is growing exponentially 📈  HOQU will be present at the event as the organizer of the World Blockchain Forum is none other than Dr. Moe Levin, Advisor to the project. Representing HOQU at the forum shall be CVO Roman Kaufman as one of the keynote speakers. The project’s stand will be manned by Co-Founder Alexei Shmonov and Artem Antonov.  ✈️As HOQU continues its roadshow, multiple events will be attended in 2018. 🔥 Follow the updates of HOQU – the future of marketing 🔥  Read more on steemit: https://steemit.com/blockchain/@hoqu/hoqu-attends-next-events-world-blockchain-forum-and-crypto-finance-conference-2018

Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅

Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Apparently, you are not familiar with the Internet marketing market at all. According to this scheme, they have been working for a long time, CPA-networks act as intermediaries. HOQU will be a CPA network, only it will be created on the basis of the blockchain.

Author: sorrelin
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: I wonder why advertisers use the services of intermediaries, if it would be more convenient for them to work directly with partners?

Author: scifilover
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Because when you work directly, the advertiser has to spend a lot of time calculating and paying rewards to partners. In addition, they have to independently identify fraudulent actions, which also takes a lot of time. In CPA-networks, advertisers do not need to do this.

Body: Report of Shmonov Alexey  business activity HOQU CEO and Co-founder  Dear investor ! Before you send your precious money and buy coin HOQU highly recommend read more details about  the founders of HOQU project. The information we put in these reviews, a fully or partially open and you can get it perfectly legally from the websites of the tax authorities of Russia www.nalog.ru any of the legal systems SBIS or Tensor. Any professional accountant in Russia has access to the given data and can for you to get it.  We don't want to do any conclusions, but proposed to perform information about the capabilities and competencies of the project participants HOQU and of course let's start with the CEO of HOQU Shmonova Alexey.   Alex is the initiator and co-investor of the project HOQU. Other co-investors are his friends by  University STANKIN: Maxim Anikeev Andrew and Alexander Dudnikova  Following are the business activity of Mr. Shmonov:  move.ru Company MOVE LLC — classified ads for real estate in Moscow and some other cities. Earns on advertising, and ads for the sale of real estate. INN Tax number 9715273267 100% founder of Shmona Alexey CEO — Lomakin Konstantin Aleksandrovich  Economic performance of MOVE LLC for 2016. - assets according balance sheet – zero USD. - cash on the bank account — 730 USD. - borrowings — 2700 USD. Revenue for 2016 — 8200 USD. Net profit of 2016  — 3780 USD  "NATIONAL SEARCH AND REAL ESTATE INFORMATION SYSTEM" LLC Alex Shmonov owns 25% shares of capital  Revenue for 2016 — 1136216 USD Loss of 2016 — 8800 USD. Assets of the company — zero USD.  This company is the continuation of the project https://move.ru used to optimize both income and taxes.  Conclusion: small business. Moreover, It is high probability there are cases of tax fraud.     OOO AAA Group Retail Alex Shmona is the owner of 1\3 the company. For 2016 the company reported revenues of 760 000 USD Net profit — 57 000 USD. The company's assets is zero.  Conclusion: this company is just the Internet online store. Made on a CMS MODx. No solutions in the field of blockchain the online store does not require and won't introduce anything new.   GENERAL CONCLUSION:   Completely lacks the resources to any international projects. Even spending on advertising and promotion of the project HOQU are VERY significant for this command.  If Alex is able to bring something new to blockchain technology ? Author: cryptomoneyresearcher
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: I found a document with definitions, I hope you undersand better. I'm going to put them here: Quote -CPM stands for cost per thousand Impressions. Is one of the most common ways of buying digital media. You essentially pay for every time your ad loads on a page or in an app. -CPC stands for cost per click advertising. Here the  advertiser pays when a click  is made on an ad. -CPL is short for cost per lead, meaning that the advertiser pays when a lead form is completed and submitted. CPL is common in B2B marketing, where it is unlikely that someone will make a purchase immediately. -CPS Cost per acquisition or cost per sale. Here the advertiser pays only if a purchase is made. -CPI In mobile app marketing, CPI refers to media programs where the advertiser pays for every installed app.

Author: Space32
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: 1.   The first WP page is written in terms that are incomprehensible to a person not engaged in advertising business. There is a dedicated editor in the team; the document is intended to send a message to an uninitiated audience, but nevertheless the market issues won’t be clear to an investor. 2.   Glossary of key terms appears right after the gist of the project. Why? To read it twice? 3.   The quotation: “The International Advertising Bureau identified the main problem for internet advertising and performance marketing as the establishing of common client action accounting mechanisms between advertisers (merchants) and affiliates” requires further specification (name of the Bureau) and references for the text of the paper/report/artcle/. 4.   Civic's identity verification – Why does a user need the application? 5.   Item 2.3 is not described at all.  Take it on trust? 6.   Item 2.6 – Affiliates will be obliged to return funds. How? 7.   There is a lack of real-life examples – How does the market work now and how will it work with HOQU. (the second part is partially described on page 16) 8.   Page 16 – “A flow of leads that are collected and processed by tracking services for a particular offer” – What are these tracking services, and who controls them? It is a guarantee of validity of the affiliates’ data, yet it’s not mentioned. The description is given only after 10 pages in technical part of the document. The issues of self-sufficiency and correct operation aren’t addressed. It questions integrity of the platform. 9.   Item 4.3 – “Data from the blockchain will be collected in real time, then processed and stored in a relational database” – Who owns this database? Are we back to centralization? 10.   Who makes a decision in the appeal centers? Is it under control of the platform? “The appeal centers have their own rating that is dependent on the adoption of equitable and prompt decisions on appeals arising” – What is that supposed to mean? What is this rating? Who decides whether it is a fair decision? 11.   The calculations inside the system are strange – “It is also possible to fix the cost of a lead to any fiat currency. In this case, the value of a lead will be calculated in HQX tokens at the internal exchange rate current at the moment the lead was created on the hoqu.com web service” – Exchange-rate volatility may cause profit or loss out of nothing. None of the system participants can predict it. 12.   Page 23 – Description of the connection to the API – So, if I don’t get an API-key, then I won’t be able to work with a customer? But what about openness? No one will give the keys to newcomers, thus an artificial barrier to entry is made. 13.   Page 24 – Anti-Fraud system - Where are these neural networks launched? What was used for machine learning? 14.   Page 25 – "Each affiliate network can use different plugins for customization, and it is also possible to create custom plug-ins to be made available to affiliates" - What is it? What for? 15.   Page 29 - The total of Hard cap at Pre-Sale and Hard cap at Main Sale does not equal to Total Hard Cap. 4952+97421!=104684 16.   Who needs tokens? A merchant buys them for fiat to pay for his task. A realizer gets them and converts back into fiat. What's the point of the tokens? Who will need them on the exchange? 17.   Predictions for the future growth of the platform are not well-reasoned. 18.   In the part about Project Economics, how the platform raises revenues is not mentioned. Previously in the text, a passing reference to 0.5% fee was made, but there is no information about it in the main section. 19.   Page 34 – "Potential revenue from these directions for the HOQU platform is not taken into account in the financial model, but it will be present in the actual operation of the platform" - How do leads from these channels get into tracking and system? 20.   Page 34 - HOQU team gets 30% of all tokens issued and an additional 10 % of 65% of all realized tokens? Why both? 21.   Page 34 – What is the difference between Global Expansion and Marketing? Why are these items divided? 22.   A chart on page 35 lacks sufficient substantiation; even an "optimistic growth scenario" in macro parameters (market share etc) is not described. 23.   Page 38 – Fiat deposit and withdrawal fees are not taken into account. In respect to big companies, there is an accounting issue – How do you balance the books? Target customer segment is big companies, and bookkeeping take precedence for them. 24.   Page 38 – “Easy start” – I’ve visited the current team project, upon which everything is being done - https://www.marketcall.ru/ - There is no hint of Easy start, FAQ at the beginning of the project occupy dozens of pages. 25.    Pictures are not translated to Russian. Comments below are given partially. 26.   According to the roadmap, NOTHING is ready thus far.   A brief summary: •   The project is described poorly – it is unclear to an investor who is not engaged in advertising; there is no mention of the project’s revenue source in the part about Project Economics. •   Decentralization is very much an open question – particularly with regard to the relational database, tracking and appeals. •   Key details of the project i.e. anti-fraud and lead tracker are not described in implementation plan. •   There are no prerequisites for the rise in the value of tokens in the project. It doesn't really make any sense for platform members to keep tokens in the wallet. •   To date, the team doesn’t have any element completed.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: We have already answered your questions in Russian topic here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2254440.msg25094608#msg25094608, but we don’t mind to answer them again. Hope you are happy with the answers:      4. Civic’s identification will be implemented if they release the functionality that they promise to give to the users. We have tried to work with Civic and their real solution is different from their white paper’s product, which looks like a scam. Currently we plan to do KYC by our own.    6.   Item 2.6 – Affiliates will be obliged to return funds. How?  6. For this specific purpose we have implemented allowance method with HQX smart-contract which will deduct tokens from accounts of merchants and affiliates.  Merchants can demand to allocate a proportion of payed out tokens as  a deposit for affiliates with 0 reputation. This means that a webmaster does not receive an amount of token reward for his job until he earns a higher reputation level so you can say that this amount is always «on hold» until certain critters are met by a webmaster, which guarantees money back in case of disputes.    8.   Page 16 – “A flow of leads that are collected and processed by tracking services for a particular offer” – What are these tracking services, and who controls them? It is a guarantee of validity of the affiliates’ data, yet it’s not mentioned. The description is given only after 10 pages in technical part of the document. The issues of self-sufficiency and correct operation aren’t addressed. It questions integrity of the platform.  8. Tracking services are the service which track leads. For instance, if you want to track calls - we have an Asterisk server. During first stages of platform development HOQU will offer tracking service and as platform develops we assume community of merchants and web-masterss will be using other tracking providers. Another instance: an affiliate networks wants to organise leads auction. They create separate tracking service which receives leads and sorts them between auction participants. This feature of registering independent tracking services is possible only if following criterias are met: - There is a processed deposit which will guarantee tracking service work - Founders are voting «for» this tracking service registration - Community members with high reputation may also vote for or against this tracking service registration This list is not finished and full methodology is to be developed further and will be available to everyone.    9.   Item 4.3 – “Data from the blockchain will be collected in real time, then processed and stored in a relational database” – Who owns this database? Are we back to centralization?  9. We will create blockchain explorer on HOQU.com basis with open API. No centralisation is included we just make things easier. If a user wants to create an aggregator he has no need to download and install the blockchain node and read all the info from it. 3rd party programs will also read all the info from explorer and not from blockchain because it is not always appropriate to allow to do this: sometimes we read from the blockchain for a fraction of a second and sometimes more than 60 seconds.     10.   Who makes a decision in the appeal centers? Is it under control of the platform? “The appeal centers have their own rating that is dependent on the adoption of equitable and prompt decisions on appeals arising” – What is that supposed to mean? What is this rating? Who decides whether it is a fair decision?  10. Appeal centers, similar to  tracking services development will be implemented by hoqu.com for the early stages of platform running. Later on there will be a possibility to register independent appeal centers. Lets say that you are an affiliate network and you can create your own appeal center. Other community members and enthusiasts may create independent centers and take a fee for disputes settlement.   11.   The calculations inside the system are strange – “It is also possible to fix the cost of a lead to any fiat currency. In this case, the value of a lead will be calculated in HQX tokens at the internal exchange rate current at the moment the lead was created on the hoqu.com web service” – Exchange-rate volatility may cause profit or loss out of nothing. None of the system participants can predict it.  11. Volatility - is a headache of all the crypto projects. There are a lot of ways how to decrease or eliminate it. The example of connection payout rate to a fiat currency is just one of them. Each participant places his own offer parameters and others decide to work or not on these terms. In other words to take the risks or not. There is a room for intermediaries who will take volatility and FX risks and provide services for platform participants in fait currencies.    12.   Page 23 – Description of the connection to the API – So, if I don’t get an API-key, then I won’t be able to work with a customer? But what about openness? No one will give the keys to newcomers, thus an artificial barrier to entry is made.  12. That is correct. Many affiliate networks do not take in just anyone. There may be restrictions and minimum experience and reputation demand to qualify to enter a particular affiliate network. Others network may create a separate offer for a particular partner. But we imagine most of the affiliate networks to be open.   13.   Page 24 – Anti-Fraud system - Where are these neural networks launched? What was used for machine learning?  13. Neural networks are learning from customers’ characteristics. Input parameters:  time spent on web-site, activity (number of actions per time), pages jumps, clicks, mouse movements and scroll buttons hits, browser info and etc. To make neural network lear we outsource this feature from a partner so they serve the traffic.  Concerning calls - we provide all the info for a neural network by ourselves. We analyse more than 20 characteristics such as call length, time of the day, region code, telephony service provider and etc. Currently we have around 342 thousand calls for studies.   14.   Page 25 – "Each affiliate network can use different plugins for customization, and it is also possible to create custom plug-ins to be made available to affiliates" - What is it? What for?  14. Currently we integrate MarketCall affiliate network into HOQU. Plugins: personal manager panel, on-line chat, affiliate network’s news and ticket systems.   19.   Page 34 – "Potential revenue from these directions for the HOQU platform is not taken into account in the financial model, but it will be present in the actual operation of the platform" - How do leads from these channels get into tracking and system?  19. For each source a partner uses separately rented telephone number of an affiliate network. This allows to track phone calls from any source including radio, printed sources, outdoor and etc. This model is already implemented and successfully working in the MarketCall company.   26.   According to the roadmap, NOTHING is ready thus far.  26. We already have almost finished smart contract prototype on a blockchain and MVP, here is the screenshot   The video with the MVP is going to be presented on Monday, 27 of November. For institutional investors we are planning to do a live demonstration face-to-face..   A brief summary: •   The project is described poorly – it is unclear to an investor who is not engaged in advertising; there is no mention of the project’s revenue source in the part about Project Economics. •   Decentralization is very much an open question – particularly with regard to the relational database, tracking and appeals. •   Key details of the project i.e. anti-fraud and lead tracker are not described in implementation plan. •   There are no prerequisites for the rise in the value of tokens in the project. It doesn't really make any sense for platform members to keep tokens in the wallet. •   To date, the team doesn’t have any element completed.   I want to note about your «summary»: •   white paper is not a technical paper •   Our product is really complex to be understood using only technical terms •   While writing the white paper a lot of material has been cut by our advisors not to clog it and make easier to read and understand. Otherwise the volume would be enormous. •   There are a lot of preconditions for token price increase. It is a matter of a few week and we Will announce the agreements with partners who are doing marketing by pay per ICO model  From complited features we can name •   Smart contract prototype •   Web-application of a web-master •   Web-application of a merchant   P.S. All technical questions May be asked directly to @eclmadfly by telegram chat. P.S.S. Respect us and yourself, do not ask the same questions in multiple threads and Telegram chat if you are so savvy in this area.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: The Main Sale Round 1 Has begun!  Excellent news for all willing to contribute to the development of HOQU as the Token Main Sale has been divided into two Round events. Round 1 is slated for 27.11.2017–26.02.2018 and Round 2 slated for Q2-Q3, 2018. The Hard Cap on the main sale of 27 November to 26 February, 2018 is 25,527 ETH. The price of Tokens on the Main Sale will be 1 HQX = 0.0002 ETH or 1 ETH = 5,000 HQX with the Minimum Buying Transaction at 0.1 ETH.  The Bonus system has also undergone changes and now applies a progressive Token bonus model with the first 10% of investors receiving 20% additional Tokens. Full information on the details of the Main Sale Round 1 can be found on the HOQU website and White Paper. The Main Sale Round 2 Event is intended specifically for users so they may acquire Tokens for platform application.  . Stay tuned for more news and updates from HOQU.

The dashboards of the HOQU MVP are adapted specifically to suit the needs of both advertisers and affiliates. The instruments offered to affiliates include: lead following and statistics, earnings tracking client call records API and other features and settings for affiliates which are needed for day to day activities.  Advertiser dashboards are also endowed with an ergonomic and user-friendly interface with clear designation of offer parameters, budget and sales statistics, as well as other vital features necessary to run efficient and transparent advertising campaigns With the Main Sale Round 1 event starting on November 27, HOQU is preparing for the launch of its MVP to demonstrate both users and investors the advantages and functionality of the platform. Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Hey, guys, sorry for being silent for a while - here are the answers for questions asked above:      Smart contract ensures fair and transparent transactions between merchants and affiliates. Smart contract closes a transaction once it sees a trigger factor on the blockchain. Let’s take an example. A developer and an affiliate enter into contract that obliges the affiliate to drive traffic to the website to encourage apartment sales. As soon as blockchain provides information that the apartment has been sold, smart contract makes a payout (% of transaction value) to the affiliate.  So all the participants have clear understanding what is going to happen ensuring trust between the parties.  Quote from: ro777jer on November 07, 2017, 11:47:16 AM Quote from: nothappend on November 07, 2017, 09:56:36 AM Quote from: bit679 on November 07, 2017, 08:44:57 AM How will remote Identification be held in HOQU? Blockchain platform Civic will be used for this. Does it guarantee high quality of identification? Can it be integrated with other blockchain solutions?   Currently we are working on Civic integration which is trusted by other companies to verify identities. If we feel that extra verification tool is needed we will find additional solution(s).   Quote from: fgreg2692june on November 07, 2017, 01:52:35 PM Hey. If I work on HOQU as an advertiser, will I need to pay a fee to the platform?  There is no extra fees for entries or being a part of HOQU ecosystem except 0.5% from the transaction made. This is our view and business strategy to keep fees low and affordable to everyone

We decided to launch our token sale to involve as many people as we can to create a decentralized ecosystem which will be used to build CPA services, ranging from affiliate programs to a affiliate networks and related products. HOQU’s mission is to make the distribution of rewards in the internet affiliate market more equitable and to set new standards of transparency and efficiency that will benefit all the participants.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅

All the community will be able to do their own solutions based on our SDK and get information for them from blockchain via API. No personal data is disclosed statistics and figures is a very interesting field which is not disclosed to public or even customers. To HOQU participants who don’t want to create their technical solutions by using our SDK, we’re offering an easy to use web app (desktop and mobile version)

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: How it works  Traditional affiliate network is a type of performance marketing that aims to reward affiliates for acquiring clients by using their own marketing networks. Affiliate network includes 4 types of participants: Merchant, Affiliate Network that deals with data flow and payouts, Affiliate, and Customer.   Merchant uses the affiliate network to add offers. Offers specify a certain type of data (lead) Merchant is willing to pay for (lead cost). Affiliate launches and maintains their own marketing network that may include websites, call centers, outdoor advertising, and other methods to acquire customers. By using marketing schemes, Affiliate obtains a piece of customer data (lead) that fits the offer and adds it to the affiliate network. Affiliate can do that directly or by using a tracker service that creates a lead in the required format and adds it to the affiliate network. For the most part, the lead is sent to Merchant, while meta-information with lead, offer and affiliate data is added to the affiliate network. If the lead is encrypted, Merchant only receives it upon approval by the network. If Merchant approves the lead (or doesn’t decline it within a certain timeout), the lead cost is charged from the Merchant’s account. After the network charges a commission, Affiliate receives the remaining amount (price). If Merchant declines the lead, it is sent back to Affiliate. Affiliate can sell the lead to any interested party or put it up for auction.  Using the core concept of an affiliate network, HOQU aims to enhance transparency and integrity of transactions between its participants through applying Blockchain technology for core logic and payments. Plus, HOQU creates opportunities not only for merchants and affiliates, but also affiliate networks. An affiliate network can add its available offers to HOQU to manage leads with more transparency. HOQU affiliates will be able to see offers added by the affiliate network and engage with them immediately. Let’s take a look at the core smart contract functionalities available to all participants.  All payments are made in HOQU tokens (HQX). By requesting buyToken method, any participant can buy HQX with a certain amount of ETH. Total amount of HQX credited to the participant’s account is determined by the rate To join as Affiliate, you just need to have an Ethereum address to request smart contract methods and receive payouts in HQX. Affiliate can either work directly via platform, or use tracker services. Affiliate networks can also join as HOQU Affiliate to act as a broker for its affiliates. To join as Merchant, you need to request allowance method and set a budget. By doing so, you give HOQU smart contract a permission to write off the cost of the lead from your account if you decide to buy it. Unless such a permission is given, the account owner is the only one who can manage HQX tokens. Affiliate networks can also join as HOQU Merchant to act as a broker for their merchants. To join as Affiliate Network, you need to add network information to HoQu platform by requesting addNetwork method. You need to submit the network identifier (to link together all offers within the network), network name, and url with network information. To add an offer, Merchant needs to request addOffer method and provide the offer identifier; affiliate network identifier (if the offer added is a part of affiliate network); offer name; and url with offer information. Affiliates (or affiliate networks) must refer to the information under this url to create offers in the required format and send them to merchant by using the method convenient to the merchant. For most offers, HoQu will provide special tracker services to collect, create, and deliver leads on a certain offer and add offer metadata to the platform. To add a lead to the system, Affiliate needs to request addLead method and submit the lead identifier; offer identifier; url address with the lead (if Affiliate delivers the lead to Merchant by themselves, URL field remains empty); password to get access to lead data; and lead metadata in the form of a string. Metadata format is determined by Merchant and may contain any information Merchant may need to approve the lead. Once the lead is added, the owner of the respective offer will receive an event. After checking lead metadata, the owner of the offer can approve the lead by requesting approveLead method and giving the lead identifier. If the owner of the offer fails to decline the lead within a set timeout, smart contract requests approveLead automatically and performs the following actions:  - lead cost in HQX is charged from the address of the winning offer owner  - lead cost in HQX (minus 0.5% commission) is credited to the address of the lead owner   - offer owner is provided with a password to access the lead data. If, after checking lead metadata, the offer owner refuses to approve it, they need to request declineLead method and submit the lead identifier. The lead status will be updated, and the lead owner will receive a decline event. If the lead was added by a tracker service, Affiliate will get access to the lead data to dispose of the lead as they deem appropriate.  We understand that using Ethereum wallets and requesting smart contract methods require certain technical skills and resources from system participants. To HOQU participants who don’t want to create their technical solutions by using our SDK, we’re offering an easy to use web app (desktop and mobile version). Its server side implements the logic described above and requests smart contracts by using service API. All transactions will be conducted through blockchain (but through our API), allowing to maintain transparency and decentralization. Participants will simply need to register a HOQU account, make a deposit in any suitable currency, and start using the system.  All smart contract methods are provided for information only. The final implementation will surely be different from the logic described above and may be distributed between several contracts. Examples of the above-mentioned contracts, HQX token contract, and ICO contracts are available on GitHub

Body: New blockchain project reaches $785,000 during Private Placement stage   World’s first decentralized platform for affiliate marketing HOQU.io gets 11 huge investors before the official project opening  Blockchain-based marketing platform HOQU announced closing of the Private Placement campaign started on October 6. Within one week the project managed to get 12 large investors and raised funds up to 2311 ETH that is around $785,000 (as of 13th October pirce). Most investments were invited during the ASROC Conference on Cryptocurrencies and Gaming in London hold on October 9. The net proceedings of the Private Placement are expected to be used for general working capital purposes.  The next step would be a pre-sale campaign planned on October 23. During the pre-sale BTC tokens (HQx) could be purchased for 1 ETH including 40% bonus.  HOQU is the first decentralised platform that connects performance marketing model and a blockchain technology together. Using smart-contracts HOQU platform aims to make marketing deals transparent and promises a 44% higher efficiency in marketing service, saving over $88 bln a year.

Author: Restor
Title: 🚀🔥[ANN] HOQU.io🔥🚀 - Best Service for Affiliate Marketing ⚡Hard Cap⚡ ✅MVP✅
Body: Join HOQU Community                                  BOUNTY Thread (2% ~3 500 ETH)  Local threads | Russian || Dutch || Indonesian || Spanish || Hindi || German || Turkish || Italiano || Malay || French || Português |   Main details Token: HQx Total tokens issued: 888,888,000 HQx Total tokens available for sale: 65% or 577,777,200 HQx:    - Private-Sale 4% of total tokens for sale, or 23,111,088 HQx;    - Pre-Sale 6% of total tokens for sale, or 34,666,632 HQx;    - Token Sale 90% of total tokens for sale, or 519,999,480 HQx. Currencies accepted: Ethereum (ETH) Token Issue Date: yet to be announced, we’re currently in preliminary talks with stock exchanges  Pre-sale  November 13, 2017 — November 20, 2017  Tokens available: 34,666,632 HQx Hard cap: 4,952 ETH Pre-sale Price: 1 ETH = 7,000 HQx (with bonus) Minimum Buying Transaction: 0.1 ETH (or equivalent in BTC/LTC) Maximum Buying Transaction: Not limited Bonuses: 40% bonus tokens  Main Sale  November 27, 2017 - February 26, 2018  Tokens available: 519,999,480 HQx Hard cap on Main Sale: 97,421 ETH Main Sale Price: 1 HQx = 0,0002 ETH or 1 ETH = 5,000 HQx Maximum Buying Transaction: None  How to join  Go to our official HOQU.io website and subscribe to our newsletter!   What is Hoqu  HOQU — is a decentralized affiliate platform that brings together performance marketing model and blockchain technology. The goal is to create a decentralized eco-system to launch blockchain-based CPA services, from affiliate programs to affiliate networks and related products. By bringing together merchants, networks and affiliates, HOQU can drastically reduce costs of all market players and set new transparency and performance standards.  Market overview  In 2010-2016, the global market of online advertising was growing by 15-22% a year. According to Statista, Magna and eMarketer, the market will account for over $227 bln in 2017 and over $335 bln by 2020. During the next 5 years, the global share of online advertising is expected to grow from 36% to 50%. Affiliate marketing is currently a major online advertising model, both in terms of market share and growth. Affiliate marketing focuses on actual measurable result and provides payouts for target actions only. Although highly promising for all players, the market is facing tough challenges that undermine its growth:  ● Existing market tools fail to solve the problem of cheating by merchants and affiliate networks and affiliate fraud (fraudulent calls, leads, etc.). ● There are thousands of affiliate networks with their own affiliate bases. Integrating with them takes a lot of time, though. Becoming a part of one of such networks requires lengthy integration ● Today, merchants have to pay ridiculously high transactions costs and broker fees. For example, affiliates and merchants are charged 3-5% of advertising budget by payment systems, 15-25% by PA and CPA networks, and 5-15% by advertising platforms and services ● To make payouts to affiliates, centralized affiliate networks need from several days to 2-3 months.  HOQU advantages  HOQU can solve burning market problems  Drastic cost reduction at all stages. HOQU’s own cryptocurrency will allow to reduce transaction costs and fees charged by financial institutions and payment services. On HOQU, merchants can launch their own affiliate programs and work directly with affiliates, cutting advertising costs by 44% Unlike centralized tracking platforms, we have no fixed monthly payments for using our decentralized platform. Blockchain solutions will allow to reduce user data storage costs. With user data stored on external platforms, HOQU will be able to set lower fees for affiliates and merchants. Merchants will only pay 0.5% of transaction value. Plus, HOQU modules operate independently. If one module fails or is hacked, other modules will continue to operate properly. This ensures high level of security for all platform participants. Reduced affiliate payout times. Smart contract automatically checks whether a lead qualifies for a payout, making immediate payouts to affiliates possible. Anti-fraud protection.HOQU uses Civic blockchain platform for user identification. Civic solves the problem of remote identification and integrates with other blockchain solutions. Smart contracts, reputation monitoring system and CPA model leave no space for fraud. Smart contracts ensure transparent and integral deals between merchants, affiliates, and affiliate networks. No need to create your own software solutions. HOQU is a brand new tracker platform that enables users to launch their own affiliate programs and CPA networks absolutely for free. No need to integrate with hundreds of affiliate networks. HOQU is a fully decentralized platform, meaning that a merchant simply needs to install an app to get access to all CPA networks and affiliates within HOQU platform. Future of marketing. An increasing number of industries are switching to blockchain technology. Using HOQU to attract clients into those industries is an ideal example of performance marketing. For example, HOQU will be a great place for merchants searching for investors to launch an Token Sale run. With HOQU, companies will be able to acquire thousands of investors in a fast and easy way. Merchant companies will have every cent of their money spent wisely, with costs ranging from 1% to 4%  To affiliate networks, we can offer affordable, technologically superior infrastructure. HOQU will be the only platform where affiliate networks will be using blockchain and smart contracts.  Benefits for buyers Costs down by 44% of advertising budget Blockchain solutions leave almost no space for fraud No need to integrate with multiple CPA networks to ensure full outreach Merchant can work with any affiliates registered with any services within HOQU platform All data are available in one personal account, regardless of the number of networks  Benefits for affiliates & CPA-networks For Affiliates Open merchant base Fair and transparent smart contract transactions CPS (Cost-per-Sale) model available Fast payouts  For CPA Networks Easy access, given free use and a vast pool of merchants and affiliates Fair reputation ranking Fair competition     Bounty Campaign   Bounty amount:17 777 760 HQx (1 HQX = 0.0002 ETH) Bounty allocation: 39% (6 933 326 HQx) Signature & Avatar Campaign 26% (4 622 218 HQx) Content creation 20% (3 555 552 HQx) Social media, incl.: Twitter Facebook Medium Telegram YouTube Reddit Instagram WeChat 15% (2 666 664 HQx) Translation and moderation    White Paper  https://www.hoqu.io/hoqu-whitepaper-en.pdf Our presentation  Join us                                   Who we are HOQU team have an extensive experience in various business projects, e-commerce, digital economics, online advertising, affiliate marketing, and payment systems.  Alexey Shmonov — CEO of HOQU, entrepreneur, online advertising expert. Co-founder of one of Russia’s first affiliate networks Marketcall, Move.ru website, and multiple e-commerce projects. In 2011-2013, Alexey worked as operations director at TurkPay and integrated PayPass into the payment system.  Andrey Duzhnikov — CTO, co-founder of Marketcall and Move.ru. Has 13 years’ experience IT. Has worked with high-load services and neural networks. Manages IT and web development at Marketcall and Move.ru.  Alexander Duzhnikov — COO of HOQU, 12 years’ experience in online entrepreneurship, co-founder of Russia’s largest real estate website Move.Ru, co-founder of PPC affiliate network Marketcall.Ru, co-founder of multiple e-commerce projects, including top party costume online store Vkostume.Ru. Frequently participates and speaks at CPA events in CIS countries. Organizer of annual Move Realty Awards.  Roman Kaufman — CVO (Chief Visionary Officer) of HOQU, expert in digital economics and blockchain technology, co-founder of IBCG blockchain community with over 15,000+ members. Runs blockchain seminars and conferences.  Maxim Anikeev — CMO (Chief Marketing Officer) of HOQU, entrepreneur, online marketing expert, CEO of PromoPage. Has more than 10 years’ experience in online marketing. Partner at several PromoPage-related projects. Co-Founder (Top-3 in Moscow) and marketing head of East Lines transportation company. In 2008 established LifeSpain.com.  Yuri Yuriev —  top analyst of HOQU. Headed analytical departments at Move.ru, Marketcall, and major e-commerce projects. In late 2010, picked up cryptocurrencies as a hobby. Alexander Krivtsun — Senior Developer. Specializes in neural networks and development of decentralized blockchain-based apps Denis Degtyarov — Senior Developer Valdimir Kamensky — Project Manager Konstantin Lozhkin — PHP programmer  HOQU in press Cointelegraph CoinIdol.com CoinJournal.net Bitcoinist.com Cryptopanic thebitcoinnews.com   HOQU news 10/14/2017 - HOQU reaches $785,000 during Private Placement stage 10/20/2017 - HOQU digest
